StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranColonizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of colony modules and basic colony buildings.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranXenoIndustrializationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved colony buildings.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranIndustrialSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the cost of building manufacturing and research centers.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranAdvancedConstruction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranConstructionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of manufacturing plants.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranXenoManufacturingMethods_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranIndustrialExpertise_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate manufacturing facilities.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPracticalFusion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved power plants.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranQuantumPower_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic power plants.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInstitutionalResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranResearchOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the manufacturing cost of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranResearchOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranResearchCenters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranTechnologicalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of Research improvements.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranIntegratedResearch_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranResearchMatrixTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranDeeperKnowledge_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of deep research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranQuantumUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved deep research facilities.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranBeyondMortality_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced deep research facilities. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranResearchCoordination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of research support facilities.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranNeroLinking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved research support facilities.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPlanetaryImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of civilian buildings. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranXenoAgriculturalAdaptation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved farms. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranFoodDistributionTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of farming support buildings. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranXenoIrrigation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved farming support buildings. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranBiomassResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced farming support buildings. Increases food production.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranXenoBiology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPopulationEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranBioReplication_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic medical facilities. Increases population growth.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranEnvironmentalEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows soil enhancement and improves adjacency terrain effects.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranExtremeWorldColonization_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows settlement on extreme worlds, at reduced production potential.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranColonizationFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Aquatic Worlds, and boost their wealth and Tourism.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranColonizationFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Frozen Worlds, and boost their Research and Influence.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranColonizationFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Barren Worlds, and boost their Manufacturing and Military.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranAtmosphericCleansing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows settlement on radioactive and toxic worlds, at reduced production potential.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranBiospherePerfection1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Radioactive Worlds, and boost their Manufacturing output.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranBiospherePerfection2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Normalizes Production of Toxic Worlds, and boost their Research output.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranHabitatImprovement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced terraforming plants.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranSoilReclamation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the use of almost useless terrain.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranEnvironmentalResequencing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the amount of usable land on all colonized planets.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranEngineeringTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hyperdrives and tiny hulls.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInterstellarTravel_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves sensor, life support, and speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInterstellarSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInterstellarSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of Colony & Constuctor modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInterstellarSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the range of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranIonDriveTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of improved hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranIonOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranWarpFieldTheory_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of advanced hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranWarpFieldFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the speed of all ships.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranHyperwarpWaves_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of exotic hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranStellarFoldingTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate hyperdrives.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranHyperfieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranGravityFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranHyperfieldDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of enemy speed reduction modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranStellarFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced speed boosting support modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInterstellarSurvey_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved sensors and survey modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranTargetingAssistTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and stealth modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranTargetingSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeting and jamming modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranXenoArcheology_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research, and begins the path towards Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPrecursorStudies_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPrecursorExploitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPrecursorEngineering_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research and Ascension crystal mining.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPrecursorUnderstanding_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Precursor research. Prepares civilization for Ascension.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranLifeSupport_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranSupportFieldGeneration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPromethionSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranLosslessSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate life support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranSupportFieldMastery_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranExplorationExtention_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced fleet life support modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranOrbitalManufacturing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved manufacturing buildings, and small hulls.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranHullRepairSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of hull support and repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranSelfHealingHulls_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tactical repair modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranCarrierFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Interceptor Drones

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranCarrierFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the construction of cheap and light Guardian Drones.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranHighCapacityCarriers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of high capacity carrier modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInterstellarLogistics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of mining facilities. Increases Logistics.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranHighEfficiencyMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranResourceExtraction_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced mining facilities.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranLosslessMining_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of targeted resource extractor modules.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranWeaponsSystemsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranWeaponsSpecializationTech1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Accuracy of all weapon systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranWeaponsSpecializationTech2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Mass of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranWeaponsSpecializationTech3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Cost of all weapons systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranBeamWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranMatterDisruption_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam weapons.

StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranEnergyPhasing_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating beam weapons.

StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate beam weapons.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranHighEnergyTransfer_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranHighEnergyMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced beam support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranMissileWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranMissileOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases firing speed of missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranHarpoonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPhotonicWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPhotonTorpedos_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranNightmareTorpedoTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate missile weapons.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranMissileAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranAdvancedMissileGuidance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranIntelligentWarheads_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced missile support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranKineticWeapons_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPulseCannonTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranGravitonThrower_ShortDec

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranQuantumDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of devastating kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranSingularityDrivers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate kinetic weapons.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranKineticAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranMassManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInertialMagnification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced kinetic support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranMilitarizationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the construction of military shipyards and defense platforms.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranMilitarySpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase our colonies ability to resist invaders.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPlanetaryInvasion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows transport modules to be constructed.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInvasionOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Planetary Bombardments to be conducted during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInvasionOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Informational Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInvasionOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows Biological Warfare tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranStallerMarines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranGravitationalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows tidal disruption tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranGravitationalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows core detonation tactics to be used during invasions.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranDroneSoldiers_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and transport capacity.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranAdvancedInvasionTactics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves soldier effectiveness and allows construction of advanced transports.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranFortification_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of defensive fortifications, and improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranDefensiveFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Planetary Bombardment.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranDefensiveFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Information Warfare.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranDefensiveFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes all colonies Immune to Biological Warfare.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranOrbitalDefencePlatform_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Adds defensive fighters to orbit, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPlanetaryDefenseDome_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of planetary defense dome, improves planetary defense.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranDefenseSystemTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic defensive systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranShieldSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield systems.

StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInvulnerabilityTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate shield systems.

StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranEnergyFieldManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced shield support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranDroneSentrySystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranArreonMissileDefenseTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate point defense systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPointDefenseSupportSystem_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPointDefenseAugmentation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPointDefenseManipulation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced point defense support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranArmorSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranDurantiumCompositeTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranKanviumLaminateTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranZeroPointArmorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate armor systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranArmorSupportSystems_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranArmorEnhancement_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranIntegrityFieldProjection_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced armor support systems.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranTranslatorTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Can begin communicating with aliens. Boosts diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranDiplomaticSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Get better deals when trading with other races.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInterstellarGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Stellar Empire form of government.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranGalacticGovernance_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Galactic Republic form of government.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInterstellarDemocracyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Interstellar Democracy form of government.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranStarFederationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows use of Star Federation form of government.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranDiplomacyTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of embassies and the formation of basic treaties.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInterstellarAlliances_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranEminenceTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced diplomatic buildings. Increases Diplomacy.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranUnitedPlanetsLobbyist_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks additional Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranUnitedPlanetsClout_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks more powerful Resolutions to be proposed.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranCulturalInfluence_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranCulturalOptimization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces maintenance costs of cultural buildings.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranCulturalOutreach_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranCulturalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases Influence on planets with high approval.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranStellarEmigration_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranCulturalAssimilation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranCulturalDomination_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate cultural buildings. Increases Influence.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranXenoCommerce_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic economic buildings and freighters.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranXenoEconomics_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInterstellarBanking_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranFinancialSectorsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranGalacticStockMarket_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate economic buildings.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInterstellarTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranTradeOptimization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases overall value of trade routes

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranTradeOptimization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranGalacticTrade_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranTradeFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: All starbases now give a significant boost to the trade income of colonies with their Area of Effect.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranTradeFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows the establishment of one additional trade route

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranGalacticFacilitation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranTradeMasters_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic trading buildings. Adds two trade routes.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranXenoEntertainment_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of basic entertainment buildings. Increases Approval.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranInterstellarTourism_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of improved entertainment buildings. Begin collecting tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPopulationDiversion_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranApprovalFocus1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase the morale of your colonies.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranApprovalFocus2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes building Entertainment Improvements much cheaper.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranApprovalFocus3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Greatly reduces the Maintenance required by Entertainment Improvements.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranSuperiorRecreation_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranContentmentTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the ultimate entertainment buildings.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranGalacticCruseLines_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranWondersoftheGalaxy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of advanced tourism structures. Increases tourism income.

StringTable.Label: Mercenaries_TerranPilgrimageTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of exotic tourism structures. Increases tourism income.
